meanings.definition: Generosity or liberality in giving or spending
meanings.sent1: Her freehandedness in donating to charity touched many hearts.
meanings.sent2: His freehandedness in sharing his lunch with a friend showed kindness.
meanings.sent3: The freehandedness of the magician with his tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The freehandedness of nature in painting the sky with colors is breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The king's freehandedness in granting wishes made him beloved by his people.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being open or frank
meanings.sent1: Her freehandedness in expressing her emotions made her easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: His freehandedness in sharing his thoughts made conversations enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The freehandedness of the child in telling stories brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The freehandedness of the river in flowing through the valley was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's freehandedness in explaining concepts made learning fun.

meanings.definition: The act of giving or spending freely

meanings.sent2: His freehandedness in treating his friends to ice cream was appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The freehandedness of the squirrel in sharing nuts with others was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The freehandedness of the wind in scattering seeds across the field was nature's gift.
meanings.sent5: The company's freehandedness in donating to local causes helped the community.
